Class RoomData

java.lang.Object
main.RoomData
public class RoomData extends Object
The RoomData class provides CRUD operations for managing room data in the database. It includes methods to create, update, delete, and retrieve room records.

    • addRoom

      public void addRoom(Room room)
      Adds a new room to the database.
      Parameters:
      room - the Room object containing the room details to add.

    • delRoom

      public void delRoom(int roomID)
      Deletes a room from the database by its ID.
      Parameters:
      roomID - the ID of the room to delete.

    • updateRoom

      public void updateRoom(Room room)
      Updates an existing room in the database.
      Parameters:
      room - the Room object containing the updated room details.

    • getRoomID

      public Room getRoomID(int roomID)
      Retrieves a room by its ID.
      Parameters:
      roomID - the ID of the room to retrieve.
      Returns:
      the Room object, or null if not found.

    • roomNumSearch

      public List<Room> roomNumSearch(String roomNum)
      Searches for rooms by their room number.
      Parameters:
      roomNum - the room number to search for.
      Returns:
      a List of Room objects matching the search criteria.

    • listRooms

      public List<Room> listRooms()
      Retrieves a list of all rooms in the database.
      Returns:
      a List of Room objects containing all room records.

    • listAvailRoom

      public List<Room> listAvailRoom()
      Retrieves a list of available rooms in the database.
      Returns:
      a List of Room objects containing available rooms.

    • updatePrice

      public void updatePrice(int id, double price)
      Updates the price of a room by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the room.
      price - the new price to set.

    • listAvailableRoomsByType

      public List<Room> listAvailableRoomsByType(String roomType)
      Retrieves a list of available rooms by type.
      Parameters:
      roomType - the type of rooms to search for.
      Returns:
      a List of Room objects of the specified type.
